2016.latias.bundle.3: Latias and Latios make a great team! These promo cards work better together—Latias’s Energy Assist attack can recharge Latios after Latios discards Energy to its Infinite Wing attack. This bundle also includes three 10-card booster packs from the Pokémon TCG: Call of Legends expansion!
2016.latias.bundle.4: This bundle contains: 3 Pokémon TCG: Call of Legends booster packs (10-card) 1 foil Latias Pokémon card (Black Star Promo, HGSS10) 1 foil Latios Pokémon card (Black Star Promo, HGSS11) These cards are legal for Legacy format tournaments and competition. This offer runs through January 30, 2018. This bundle is only available in the Pokémon TCG Online and is not sold in retail stores as a physical product.
2016.tpci.wobbuffet.bundle.3: Wobbuffet’s Bide Barricade Ability removes all Abilities from any Pokémon that isn’t a Psychic type—a game changer for sure! This Pokémon also comes with card sleeves, a Pikachu coin, and a 10-card booster pack from the Pokémon TCG: XY—Steam Siege expansion!
2016.tpci.wobbuffet.bundle.4: This bundle contains: 1 Wobbuffet Pokémon card (XY—Phantom Forces, 36/119) 1 Pokémon TCG: XY—Steam Siege booster pack (10-card) Card sleeves 1 Pikachu coin These cards are legal for Expanded format tournaments and competition. This offer runs through June 27, 2017. This bundle is only available in the Pokémon TCG Online and is not sold in retail stores as a physical product.
2017.avatar.lycanroc-midday-form.descrip: Give your Trainer a look as bright as the sun with the Lycanroc Midday Form Trainer Set.
2017.avatar.lycanroc-midnight-form.descr: Cloak yourself in stylish deep crimson with the Lycanroc Midnight Form Trainer Set.
com.direwolfdigital.cake.rules.abilities: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.
Discard your opponent's Active Pokémon and all cards attached to it. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
Flip 2 coins. This attack does 100 damage for each heads.

tpci.2017.pokemon.league.q2.deckbox.name: Sun & Moon—Guardians Rising Deck Box
tpci.2017.pokemon.league.q2.name: 2017 Sun & Moon—Guardians Rising Pokémon League Bundle
tpci.2017.pokemon.league.q2.season1.desc: Thank you for attending your local Pokémon League! This code will unlock 4 foil promo cards featuring Oricorio (Baile Style) and a Sun & Moon—Guardians Rising themed deck box for you to enjoy or trade!
tpci.2017.pokemon.league.q2.season1.name: Sun & Moon—Guardians Rising Season 1
tpci.product.tapu-koko.pin.collection.na: Pokémon TCG: Tapu Koko Pin Collection
tpci.product.tapu-koko.pin.collection.se: Tapu Koko is one of the guardian Pokémon of the Alola region, with a deep connection to the land itself! With the Tapu Koko Pin Collection, you get Tapu Koko both as a fun collector’s pin and as a never-before-seen foil promo card! Stand ready to guard the islands with Tapu Koko!
